overview:
Associate Professor - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
Ph. D. – Polymer Technology, Delhi Technological University, Delhi
M. E. – Polymer Technology, Delhi College of Engineering, Delhi University
M. Sc. – Chemistry (Materials), Jamia Millia Islamia, Delhi
Dr. Aftab Alam has a total of 28 years of experience. He has worked in industry for 5 years before joining teaching as a profession. During his tenure as an academician he has developed special competencies in Interpersonal Relations, Communication, Written and Verbal skill. He has been a trainer and educator, and has been involved in curriculum designing on multiple occasions. He has been working on a project on Bio-Polymers, Composites, Hybrid Composites, and Waste Management.

Dr. Alam has been a member of expert committees and has organized Indo-Japan workshop on “New advanced Material in Molecular electronics” sponsored by National Physical Laboratory, Delhi and Kyushu Institute of Technology, Iizuka, Japan. He has been in-charge of Industry-Institute Interaction department and looked after Training and Placement activities. He is also a life member of Indian Plastics Institute (IPI), Asian Polymer Association (APA), Polymer Processing Society, USA and the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE)

Associate Professor - Chemistry at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla- III Campus (formerly known as G.B. Pant Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. – Chemistry, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra
M.Phil. – Chemistry, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra
M.Sc. – Chemistry, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra
B.Sc. – Chemistry, Zoology, Botany, United College of Education, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra

Dr. Ranbir Singh has more than 25 years of teaching experience. He has previously worked in institutions such as Mukand Lal National College, Seth Jai Parkash Polytechnic, and Guru Nanak Khalsa College. His research interest includes Flame Retardancy of Cellulosic Materials. He performed various academic as well as administrative work such as Incharge of Chemistry Lab, Member Chemistry syllabus revision committee, Invigilation duties during BTE exam, Member Condemnation Committee, etc.

Assistant Professor - Chemistry at DSEU Okhla-II Campus (formerly known as Delhi Institute of Tool Engineering, Okhla)
Ph. D. – Polymer Science, Amity University, Noida
M. Tech. – Plastic Engineering, Central Institute of Petrochemicals Engineering and Technology, Lucknow
M. Sc. – Industrial Chemistry, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh
B. Sc. – Industrial Chemistry, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh

Dr. Swati Varshney has received University Medal in M. Sc. from Aligarh Muslim University in 2004 and was awarded for the commendable contribution in the field of academic research from Delhi Institute of Tool Engineering, Okhla. Her research interests include polymer recycling, polymer nanocomposites, and conducting polymer composites for electromagnetic shielding and antistatic applications. She has also received many certificates of appreciation for monitoring projects of B. Tech. (Tool Engineering) students from GGSIP University. She has authored many research/reviews in reputed pre-reviewed journals and book chapters.

Assistant Professor - Chemistry at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. – Delhi Technological University
M.Phil. – Panjab University, Chandigarh
M.Sc. – Panjab University, Chandigarh
B.Sc. – Government College for Women Ludhiana, Panjab University, Chandigarh

Dr. Usha Raju has been the Academic In-charge at DSEU Pusa Campus since January 2006. She was selected through UPSC and joined the Directorate of Training and Technical Education in 1998 as Lecturer – Chemistry. She served as a member of the College Council during B.Sc. and has been a Gold Medalist in M.Sc.

She is the recipient of the Commendable Research Award from Delhi Technological University in 2017-18. She has published a paper in the Journal of Organic Chemistry (American Chemical Society) during M.Phil. and has published four papers in international journals of repute during Ph.D. She has also written two books, “Text Book of Applied Chemistry, Theory and Practical” for Diploma students.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Campus Director (DSEU PUSA-II CAMPUS) - School of Logistics & supply chain management. at DSEU Pusa Campus - 2
Dr Jena is a post graduate in Commerce, M. Com (Business Management) from Jamia Milia Islamia university of New Delhi, Executive MBA from IIFT (Indian Institute of Foreign Trade) New Delhi, and PhD degree from IIFT, New Delhi.
He is having additional qualification on Supply chain management on a time-to-time basis.

Dr. N Jena has joined Delhi Skill and Entrepreneurship University as professor — Logistics and supply chain management. Prior to joining at DSEU Dr. Jena has worked in various reputed industries like Jindal Steel, Enercon India, Maharashtrian Seamless, Rajasthan Petrochemical and Pasupathi group.
Dr. Jena has 29 years of rich industrial experience with multiple Industrial brands like Steel, wind energy, petrochemical and textiles in handling high volumes of logistics and supply chain operations. In edition to the same he had been teaching aa a guest faculty at IIFT, New Delhi for the last 14 years for the weekend programs for executive MBA classes and PHD students on supply chain domain.

Assistant Professor - Chemistry at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla-I Campus (formerly known as G. B. Pant Government Engineering College, Okhla)
Ph. D. – Chemistry, Chaudhary Charan Singh (C. C. S.) University (formerly known as Meerut University), Meerut
M. Sc. – Physical Chemistry, C. C. S. University (formerly known as Meerut University), Meerut
B. Sc. – C. C. S. University (formerly known as Meerut University), Meerut

Dr. Vishnu Vats has been teaching Engineering Chemistry and Environmental Studies to undergraduate students for more than 10 years. He has been looking after the establishment of the Chemistry Lab and Procurement and installation of different lab items and instruments.

Dr. Vats has reviewed articles for journals such as Journal for Pharmaceutical Research International, Asian Journal of Physical and Chemical Sciences, Journal of Scientific Research & Reports and Molecules Journal. He has published and presented research work in several national and international conferences and journals. He is also a member of Indian Society of Technical Education, Indian Science Congress Association and a Fellow of the Indian Chemical Society.

Associate Professor - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
M. Tech. – Plastic Technology, Harcourt Butler Technical University, Kanpur (formerly Harcourt Butler Technical Institute, Kanpur)
B. Tech. – Plastic Technology, Harcourt Butler Technical University, Kanpur (formerly Harcourt Butler Technical Institute, Kanpur)
Mr. Bhim Singh has teaching experience of more than 2 decades. He has also delivered several allied duties such as Head and Incharge of the Polymer Technology Department, Incharge of Training and Placement, Examination Superintendent, and Interview Committee member of faculty recruitment. He was associated with the development of laboratories and participated in curriculum development of Polymer Technology. Mr. Singh has attended and delivered various short term courses programs and attended seminars and conferences related to Polymer Technology.

Mr. Singh has also held positions of responsibilities including Canteen Committee Incharge, member of Curriculum Development Committee, Department Technical Purchase Committee & Miscellaneous Account Committee.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Associate Professor - Business Process Management at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. – Marketing Management, Centre for Management Studies, Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi.
M.B.A. – Finance & Marketing, Amity University, Noida, U.P.

Dr. Zehra Zulfikar has more than 13 years of experience in industry and academia. She has worked in Godrej & Boyce Mfg. Co. Ltd and Brass Metal Crafters. She has held faculty positions in University of Delhi and Jamia Millia Islamia prior to joining DSEU. She has experience in organizing national and international conferences. She has also worked as an active team member in capacity building exercises which bagged ‘A’ grade to the academic institutions by National Assessment and Accreditation Council. Zehra has numerous research papers published in international journals of great repute. She has participated and presented several research papers in various national and international conferences and has mentored several research projects and dissertations of graduate and under-graduate students.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Lecturer - Civil Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
M. Tech. – Rock Engineering and Underground Structures, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Delhi
B. Tech. – Civil Engineering, Madan Mohan Malaviya University Of Technology (MMMUT), Gorakhpur

Mr. Abhijeet Singh has an academic experience of more than a year. He has also worked at Indian Oil Corporation Limited as a Senior Operations Officer and at Nuclear Power Corporation Limited as a Scientific Officer ‘C’. Some of his academic achievements include qualification of Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) – 2019: AIR-83 & 2016: AIR-394, Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation of India Limited (DFCCIL) 2018: AIR-1,
UPSC Lecturer 2019: AIR-2, DMRC Junior Engineer 2018: AIR-48.

Mr. Abhijeet Singh has also held various positions of responsibilities such as Admission Duties and SC/ST Committee Member.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Associate Professor - Civil Engineering at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
M.E – Civil Engineering, Panjab University, Chandigarh
B.E – Civil Engineering, Panjab University, Chandigarh

Mr. Adarsh Kumar has an extensive academic experience of over 20 years. Apart from academic activities, he is a Sports Committee member and performs examination and admission duties as well.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Lecturer - Civil Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
M. Tech. – Structural Engineering, Malaviya National Institute of Technology (MNIT), Jaipur
B. Tech. – Civil Engineering, National Institute of Technology (NIT), Kurukshetra

Mr. Amit Godara has an academic experience of more than 1 year. He has performed various allied duties such as Lab Incharge & Examination duties.

Associate Professor - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
Ph. D. – Chemistry, Chaudhary Charan Singh University (formerly Meerut University), Uttar Pradesh
M. E. – Polymers Engineering, Delhi College of Engineering, Delhi
M. Sc. – Industrial Polymer Chemistry, Sardar Patel University
B. Sc. – Delhi University
Dr. Harjeet Singh has more than 23 years of experience at the Government level in teaching and allied activities and 8 years of experience in Research and Development and Quality Assurance, and technical services in the field of Polymers and their applications in today’s context. He has several papers and patents in his name. He has worked with M/S Vam Organic Chemicals Ltd, M/ S Shriram Institute For Industrial Research (SRI), M/S Insilco Limited, and M/ S Micro Industrial Corporation.

Dr. SIngh has accomplished several leadership roles such as the Incharge of Petrochemical Engineering/Polymer Technology(E), Project Officer (CPS), Public Information Officer (RTI), Staff Development Officer(SDO), member of Department Purchase Committee, Incharge of Canteen Committee, Examination Superintendent/Deputy Superintendent BTE, Centre Superintendent, BTE Spot Evaluation, member Unfair Means Committee & Moderator BTE etc.

school: Faculty of Computational and IT Enabled Skills (FCITES)
overview:
Assistant Professor - Computer Science and Application at Kasturba DSEU Pitampura Campus (formerly known as Kasturba Institute of Technology, Pitampura)
Ph.D. (pursuing) – AIACTR (now NSUT East Campus)
M.Tech. – IIIT Allahabad
B.Tech. – U.P.T.U Lucknow

Mr. Akhileshwar Prasad Agrawal has teaching interests in Programming, Data structure, DBMS, Software Engg. He has conducted sessions on Entrepreneurship, worked as AMC In-charge of computers for infrastructure maintenance, worked as committee member for designing of B. Voc. Syllabus in IP University, and been an active member in several other committees for academic and infrastructural development.

Lecturer - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
Ph. D. (Pursuing) – Chemical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur
M. Tech. – Chemical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur
B. Tech. – Chemical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur
Mr. Kalp Mishra has academic experience of over 3 years. His expertise is in Chemical Process Control Engineering. In his Postgraduate academic pursuits, he worked under the mentorship of Prof. Nitin Kaistha, one of the foremost experts of Process Control and Design in India. He is an expert in Aspentech software. His research interest is in the area of Artificial Intelligence Applications, Process Optimization and Economic Control.

Assistant Professor - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
M.Tech. – Plastics Engineering, CIPET (Central Institute of Plastics Engineering & Technology), Bhubaneswar
B.Tech. – Plastics Engineering, CIPET (Central Institute of Plastics Engineering & Technology), Bhubaneswar
She has more than five years’ experience in
academics and held the positions like Assistant
Professor in College of Engineering Roorkee and
Lecturer at CIPET: IPT, Bhubaneswar. Her area of
interest in Research & Development of polymeric
materials and polymer composites. He delivered
academics sessions to B. Tech, M. Tech and M. Sc
programs. She was a part of accreditation
processes such as NABL, NBA & NAAC during her
last academic tenure.

school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Associate Professor - Civil Engineering at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
M.E. – Soil Mechanics, Assam Engineering College, Guwahati
B.E. – Civil Engineering, National Institute of Technology, Jamshedpur

Mr. Anupam Kr Upadhyay has been working as a lecturer for 26+ years. Before that, he worked as Site Engineer at TATA Cement. He has also worked as a part time Lecturer at National Institute of Technology, Jamshedpur. Currently, he is the HOD of the Civil Engineering department of the institution. He has also developed civil consultancy work in the department.

Associate Professor - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
Ph. D. – Chemistry, Shivaji University, Kolhapur
M. Sc. – Polymer Chemistry, Shivaji University Post-Graduate Centre, Solapur
B. Sc. – Chemistry (Honors), DBF Dayanand College, Solapur
Dr. Joshi has academic experience of more than 25 years. Before joining Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus he was a Lecturer on contract and Research Fellow at Shivaji University where he also received his Ph.D. Degree with a thesis titled “Synthesis and Properties of Polyquinoxalines & High-Temperature Resistant Polymers”. He has research experience in the area of synthesis and characterization of high-performance Polymers.

Dr. Joshi has worked as Incharge and Head of Department (HOD) for 8 years. He has been a member of the Curriculum Committee, Deputy Controller at Common Entrance Test (CET) 2012-2015 and Secretary of the Advisory Committee of CET 2014-15. He was also a member of the High-Level Committee for Inter-Polytechnic Sports, Member and Chairman of several committees such as Canteen, Bus, Sports, Library, Teaching Aids, Enquiry Committee, and Purchase Committee. He is also an experienced Paper Setter, Moderator, Deputy Superintendent of Exams, Centre Supervisor of Spot Assessment and also a member of the Unfair Means Committee. Dr. Joshi was also a member of the Panel of Interview for Contractual Lecturers in Polymer Technology and Applied Chemistry.
